category.name: Active Workspace.Material Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mtw0MaterialSubstanceInfo.mtw0SubstanceCompInMaterial.FORMATSTRING
preference.preference_description: Specifies the format used to display the value of the property "mtw0SubstanceCompInMaterial" for objects of type "Mtw0MaterialSubstanceInfo". The default value is "##.####", where "#" indicates a digit. It will be displayed if it adds to the accuracy of the number but not if it is a leading zero or a zero at the end of a decimal.
